verses.verse: וַיָּ֣שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> Then he brought me back אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way שַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate הַמִּקְדָּשׁ֙ <S%H4720><s%> sanctuary הַֽחִיצ֔וֹן <S%H2435><s%> of the outward הַפֹּנֶ֖ה <S%H6437><s%> which looketh קָדִ֑ים <S%H6921><s%> toward the east וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> and it was סָגֽוּר׃ <S%H5462><s%> and it [was] shut

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלַ֜י <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַשַּׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> unto me This gate הַזֶּה֩ <S%H2088><s%> This סָג֨וּר <S%H5462><s%> shall be shut יִהְיֶ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> become לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and no יִפָּתֵ֗חַ <S%H6605><s%> it shall not be opened וְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> and no man לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no יָ֣בֹא <S%H935><s%> shall enter ב֔וֹ כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> in by it because the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> hath entered ב֑וֹ וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become סָגֽוּר׃ <S%H5462><s%> in by it therefore it shall be shut

אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנָּשִׂ֗יא <S%H5387><s%> [It is] for the prince נָ֥שִׂיא <S%H5387><s%> the prince ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יֵֽשֶׁב־ <S%H3427><s%> he shall sit בּ֥וֹ [לֶאֱכֹול־ כ] (לֶאֱכָל־ <S%H398><s%> to eat לֶ֖חֶם <S%H398><s%> in it to eat ק) לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מִדֶּ֨רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way אֻלָ֤ם <S%H197><s%> of the porch הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> of [that] gate יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> he shall enter וּמִדַּרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H1870><s%> by the way יֵצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> and shall go out

וַיְבִיאֵ֜נִי <S%H935><s%> Then brought דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> he me the way שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַצָּפוֹן֮ <S%H6828><s%> of the north אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הַבַּיִת֒ <S%H1004><s%> the house וָאֵ֕רֶא <S%H7200><s%> and I looked וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold מָלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> filled כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> and behold the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וָאֶפֹּ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> and I fell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on פָּנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> upon my face

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלַ֜י <S%H413><s%> about יְהֹוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָ֡ם <S%H120><s%> of man שִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> mark לִבְּךָ֩ <S%H3820><s%> well וּרְאֵ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> and behold בְעֵינֶ֜יךָ <S%H5869><s%> with thine eyes וּבְאָזְנֶ֣יךָ <S%H241><s%> with thine ears שְּׁמָ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> and hear אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> that אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I מְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> all that I say אֹתָ֔ךְ <S%H853><s%> לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֻקּ֥וֹת <S%H2708><s%> unto thee concerning all the ordinances בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all [תֹּורֹתֹו כ] (תֹּֽורֹתָ֑יו <S%H8451><s%> bullock ק) וְשַׂמְתָּ֤ <S%H7760><s%> thereof and mark לִבְּךָ֙ <S%H3820><s%> well לִמְב֣וֹא <S%H3996><s%> the entering in הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מוֹצָאֵ֥י <S%H4161><s%> with every going forth הַמִּקְדָּֽשׁ׃ <S%H4720><s%> of the sanctuary

וְאָמַרְתָּ֤ <S%H559><s%> And thou shalt say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֙רִי֙ <S%H4805><s%> to the rebellious אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> [even] to the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> let it suffice לָכֶ֛ם מִֽכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all תּוֹעֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H8441><s%> you of all your abominations בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> O ye house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

בַּהֲבִיאֲכֶ֣ם <S%H935><s%> In that ye have brought בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted נֵכָ֗ר <S%H5236><s%> alien עַרְלֵי־ <S%H6189><s%> uncircumcised לֵב֙ <S%H3820><s%> in heart וְעַרְלֵ֣י <S%H6189><s%> and uncircumcised בָשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> in flesh לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> to be in בְּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <S%H4720><s%> to be in my sanctuary לְחַלְּל֣וֹ <S%H2490><s%> to pollute אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּיתִ֑י <S%H1004><s%> it [even] my house בְּהַקְרִֽיבְכֶ֤ם <S%H7126><s%> when ye offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לַחְמִי֙ <S%H3899><s%> my bread חֵ֣לֶב <S%H2459><s%> the fat וָדָ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> and the blood וַיָּפֵ֙רוּ֙ <S%H6565><s%> and they have broken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִ֔י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant אֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all תּוֹעֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H8441><s%> of all your abominations

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8104><s%> And ye have not kept מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <S%H4931><s%> the charge קָדָשָׁ֑י <S%H6944><s%> of mine holy things וַתְּשִׂימ֗וּן <S%H7760><s%> but ye have set לְשֹׁמְרֵ֧י <S%H8104><s%> keepers מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֛י <S%H4931><s%> of my charge בְּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <S%H4720><s%> in my sanctuary לָכֶֽם׃

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3068><s%> GOD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the children נֵכָ֗ר <S%H5236><s%> alien עֶ֤רֶל <S%H6189><s%> uncircumcised לֵב֙ <S%H3820><s%> in heart וְעֶ֣רֶל <S%H6189><s%> nor uncircumcised בָּשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> in flesh לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall enter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִקְדָּשִׁ֑י <S%H4720><s%> into my sanctuary לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons נֵכָ֔ר <S%H5236><s%> alien אֲשֶׁ֕ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> of any stranger that [is] among בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> And the Levites אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who רָֽחֲקוּ֙ <S%H7368><s%> that are gone away far מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> and בִּתְע֤וֹת <S%H8582><s%> went astray יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> from me when Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who תָּע֣וּ <S%H8582><s%> which went astray away מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> and אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> from me after גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1544><s%> their idols וְנָשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> they shall even bear עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H5771><s%> their iniquity

וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְמִקְדָּשִׁי֙ <S%H4720><s%> in my sanctuary מְשָׁ֣רְתִ֔ים <S%H8334><s%> Yet they shall be ministers פְּקֻדּוֹת֙ <S%H6486><s%> [having] charge אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <S%H8179><s%> at the gates הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וּֽמְשָׁרְתִ֖ים <S%H8334><s%> and ministering אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> to the house הֵ֠מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they יִשְׁחֲט֨וּ <S%H7819><s%> they shall slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹלָ֤ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזֶּ֙בַח֙ <S%H2077><s%> and the sacrifice לָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> for the people וְהֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> and they יַעַמְד֥וּ <S%H5975><s%> and they shall stand לִפְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> before לְשָֽׁרְתָֽם׃ <S%H8334><s%> them to minister

יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> they יְשָׁרְת֤וּ <S%H8334><s%> Because they ministered אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> unto them before גִלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1544><s%> their idols וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> and became לְבֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> and caused the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְמִכְשׁ֣וֹל <S%H4383><s%> to fall עָוֹ֑ן <S%H5771><s%> into iniquity עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against כֵּן֩ <S%H3651><s%> after that נָשָׂ֨אתִי <S%H5375><s%> therefore have I lifted up יָדִ֜י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> against נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> against them saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְנָשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> and they shall bear עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H5771><s%> their iniquity

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִגְּשׁ֤וּ <S%H5066><s%> And they shall not come near אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me לְכַהֵ֣ן <S%H3547><s%> unto me to do the office of a priest לִ֔י וְלָגֶ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H5066><s%> unto me nor to come near עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any קָ֣דָשַׁ֔י <S%H6944><s%> to any of my holy things אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about קָדְשֵׁ֖י <S%H6944><s%> in the most holy הַקְּדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6944><s%> to the things וְנָֽשְׂאוּ֙ <S%H5375><s%> [place] but they shall bear כְּלִמָּתָ֔ם <S%H3639><s%> their shame וְתוֹעֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H8441><s%> and their abominations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> which they have committed

וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> But I will make אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <S%H8104><s%> them keepers מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <S%H4931><s%> of the charge הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> of all עֲבֹ֣דָת֔וֹ <S%H5656><s%> for all the service וּלְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> thereof and for all that shall be done בּֽוֹ׃ פ

וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <S%H3548><s%> But the priests הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons צָד֗וֹק <S%H6659><s%> of Zadok אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who שָׁמְר֜וּ <S%H8104><s%> that kept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֤רֶת <S%H4931><s%> the charge מִקְדָּשִׁי֙ <S%H4720><s%> of my sanctuary בִּתְע֤וֹת <S%H8582><s%> went astray בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> when the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> and הֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like יִקְרְב֥וּ <S%H7126><s%> from me they shall come near אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me לְשָֽׁרְתֵ֑נִי <S%H8334><s%> to me to minister וְעָמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> unto me and they shall stand לְפָנַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> before לְהַקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> me to offer לִי֙ חֵ֣לֶב <S%H2459><s%> unto me the fat וָדָ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> and the blood נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

הֵ֜מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They יָבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> They shall enter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִקְדָּשִׁ֗י <S%H4720><s%> into my sanctuary וְהֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they יִקְרְב֥וּ <S%H7126><s%> and they shall come near אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שֻׁלְחָנִ֖י <S%H7979><s%> to my table לְשָׁרְתֵ֑נִי <S%H8334><s%> to minister וְשָׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> unto me and they shall keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמַרְתִּֽי׃ <S%H4931><s%> my charge

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְּבוֹאָם֙ <S%H935><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] when they enter אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> at שַׁעֲרֵי֙ <S%H8179><s%> in at the gates הֶחָצֵ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַפְּנִימִ֔ית <S%H6442><s%> of the inner בִּגְדֵ֥י <S%H899><s%> garments פִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6593><s%> with linen יִלְבָּ֑שׁוּ <S%H3847><s%> they shall be clothed וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יַעֲלֶ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> shall come עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> and צֶ֔מֶר <S%H6785><s%> and no wool בְּשָֽׁרְתָ֗ם <S%H8334><s%> upon them whiles they minister בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֛י <S%H8179><s%> in the gates הֶחָצֵ֥ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַפְּנִימִ֖ית <S%H6442><s%> of the inner וָבָֽיְתָה׃ <S%H1004><s%> and within

פַּאֲרֵ֤י <S%H6287><s%> bonnets פִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6593><s%> They shall have linen יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon רֹאשָׁ֔ם <S%H7218><s%> upon their heads וּמִכְנְסֵ֣י <S%H4370><s%> breeches פִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6593><s%> and shall have linen יִהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon מָתְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H4975><s%> upon their loins לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יַחְגְּר֖וּ <S%H2296><s%> they shall not gird בַּיָּֽזַע׃ <S%H3154><s%> [themselves] with any thing that causeth sweat

וּ֠בְצֵאתָם <S%H3318><s%> And when they go forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֶחָצֵ֨ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַחִיצוֹנָ֜ה <S%H2435><s%> into the utter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֶחָצֵ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַחִיצוֹנָה֮ <S%H2435><s%> [even] into the utter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָם֒ <S%H5971><s%> to the people יִפְשְׁט֣וּ <S%H6584><s%> they shall put off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H899><s%> their garments אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> they מְשָׁרְתִ֣ם <S%H8334><s%> wherein they ministered בָּ֔ם וְהִנִּ֥יחוּ <S%H3240><s%> and lay אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּלִֽשְׁכֹ֣ת <S%H3957><s%> chambers הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> them in the holy וְלָֽבְשׁוּ֙ <S%H3847><s%> and they shall put בְּגָדִ֣ים <S%H899><s%> garments אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> on other וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> so יְקַדְּשׁ֥וּ <S%H6942><s%> and they shall not sanctify אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people בְּבִגְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H899><s%> with their garments

וְרֹאשָׁם֙ <S%H7218><s%> their heads לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יְגַלֵּ֔חוּ <S%H1548><s%> Neither shall they shave וּפֶ֖רַע <S%H6545><s%> nor suffer their locks לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יְשַׁלֵּ֑חוּ <S%H7971><s%> to grow long כָּס֥וֹם <S%H3697><s%> they shall only יִכְסְמ֖וּ <S%H3697><s%> poll אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָאשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <S%H7218><s%> their heads

וְיַ֥יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִשְׁתּ֖וּ <S%H8354><s%> drink כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> shall any כֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> Neither shall any priest בְּבוֹאָ֖ם <S%H935><s%> when they enter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֶחָצֵ֥ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַפְּנִימִֽית׃ <S%H6442><s%> into the inner

וְאַלְמָנָה֙ <S%H490><s%> a widow וּגְרוּשָׁ֔ה <S%H1644><s%> nor her that is put away לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> Neither shall they take לָהֶ֖ם לְנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> for their wives כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo בְּתוּלֹ֗ת <S%H1330><s%> maidens מִזֶּ֙רַע֙ <S%H2233><s%> of the seed בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהָֽאַלְמָנָה֙ <S%H2233><s%> the offspring אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who תִּֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become אַלְמָנָ֔ה <S%H490><s%> or a widow מִכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> that had a priest יִקָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> but they shall take

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> my people יוֹר֔וּ <S%H3384><s%> And they shall teach בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [the difference] between the holy לְחֹ֑ל <S%H2455><s%> and profane וּבֵין־ <S%H996><s%> between טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> between the unclean לְטָה֖וֹר <S%H2889><s%> and the clean יוֹדִעֻֽם׃ <S%H3045><s%> and cause them to discern

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> In רִ֗יב <S%H7379><s%> And in controversy הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they יַעַמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> they shall stand [לִשְׁפֹּט כ] (לְמִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H8199><s%> avenge ק) בְּמִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <S%H4941><s%> it according to my judgments [וּשָׁפְטֻהוּ כ] (יִשְׁפְּט֑וּהוּ <S%H8199><s%> avenge ק) וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּוֹרֹתַ֤י <S%H8451><s%> my laws וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקֹּתַי֙ <S%H2708><s%> and my statutes בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מוֹעֲדַ֣י <S%H4150><s%> in all mine assemblies יִשְׁמֹ֔רוּ <S%H8104><s%> and they shall keep וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֖י <S%H7676><s%> my sabbaths יְקַדֵּֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H6942><s%> and they shall hallow

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> at no dead אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> person לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> And they shall come לְטָמְאָ֑ה <S%H2930><s%> to defile כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> for לְאָ֡ב <S%H1><s%> themselves but for father וּ֠לְאֵם <S%H517><s%> or for mother וּלְבֵ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> or for son וּלְבַ֜ת <S%H1323><s%> or for daughter לְאָ֗ח <S%H251><s%> for brother וּלְאָח֛וֹת <S%H269><s%> or for sister אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not הָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> had לְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that hath had no husband יִטַּמָּֽאוּ׃ <S%H2930><s%> they may defile
וְאַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> And after טָֽהֳרָת֑וֹ <S%H2893><s%> he is cleansed שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> unto him seven יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days יִסְפְּרוּ־ <S%H5608><s%> they shall reckon לֽוֹ׃

וּבְיוֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> And in the day בֹּא֨וֹ <S%H935><s%> that he goeth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַקֹּ֜דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> into the sanctuary אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֶחָצֵ֤ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַפְּנִימִית֙ <S%H6442><s%> unto the inner לְשָׁרֵ֣ת <S%H8334><s%> to minister בַּקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> in the sanctuary יַקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> he shall offer חַטָּאת֑וֹ <S%H2403><s%> his sin offering נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶם֙ לְֽנַחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> And it shall be unto them for an inheritance אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I נַֽחֲלָתָ֑ם <S%H5159><s%> I [am] their inheritance וַאֲחֻזָּ֗ה <S%H272><s%> them no possession לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תִתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> and ye shall give לָהֶם֙ בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I אֲחֻזָּתָֽם׃ <S%H272><s%> I [am] their possession

הַמִּנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> the meat offering וְהַחַטָּ֣את <S%H2403><s%> and the sin offering וְהָאָשָׁ֔ם <S%H817><s%> and the trespass offering הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They יֹֽאכְל֑וּם <S%H398><s%> They shall eat וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every חֵ֥רֶם <S%H2764><s%> and every dedicated thing בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel לָהֶ֥ם יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וְרֵאשִׁית֩ <S%H7225><s%> And the first כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בִּכּ֨וּרֵי <S%H1061><s%> of all the firstfruits כֹ֜ל <S%H3605><s%> of every וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every תְּר֣וּמַת <S%H8641><s%> of all [things] and every oblation כֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> of every מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all תְּרוּמ֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H8641><s%> of all of every [sort] of your oblations לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> shall be the priest's יִֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become וְרֵאשִׁ֤ית <S%H7225><s%> the first עֲרִסֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H6182><s%> of your dough תִּתְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> ye shall also give לַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest לְהָנִ֥יחַ <S%H5117><s%> to rest בְּרָכָ֖ה <S%H1293><s%> that he may cause the blessing אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on בֵּיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1004><s%> in thine house

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any נְבֵלָה֙ <S%H5038><s%> of any thing that is dead of itself וּטְרֵפָ֔ה <S%H2966><s%> or torn מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָע֖וֹף <S%H5775><s%> whether it be fowl וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> or הַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> or beast לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יֹאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> shall not eat הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <S%H3548><s%> The priests פ
